content.rendered:
Directed by Nithin Lukose

Written by Nithin Lukose

Star Nithin George(Joey). Jose Kizhakkan(Kochappan). Vinitha Koshy(Anna). Joseph Manickal(Varkey). Gaurav Pareek(Guri). Basil Paulose(Johnny)

Language Malayalam

Producers Anurag Kashyap. Nithin Lukose. Raj Rachakonda. Samir Sarkar. Venkat Siddareddy

Production Alif Talkies Productions .Studio 99
